posts.post_title: FS T-206 Sam Crawford Batting Old Mill PSA 2.5
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a nice T-206 Sam Crawford batting...nice Old Mill reverse. PSA 2.5 Nice clean card. See scans. If there are any questions, feel free to ask. Free shipping. Email or pm is fine. Thanks for looking,
Joshua
